OrgName: First Advantage Corporation and its U.S. subsidiaries
activities: First Advantage provides comprehensive background screening solutions for employers and property managers, including information related to criminal searches, motor vehicle records, credit history, verifications, and drug testing. Information will be processed online and manually.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Employment screening data from customers, which may include manually processed data. Organizational information from First Advantage may also be processed.
recoursemech: We agree to comply with the European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs).
